TopicTitle: Having some Ui trouble ever since updating Toolbar.

Articles.Content:
Now id post this in the Toolbar thread, but I fear this issue may be a combination of mods or glitches in general. Just having a few UI problems. Ever since I updated Toolbar last night.. I cant recover crafts. I get the science log, but when I hit Done the Recover Craft? box remains as does the craft itself. Strange enough though it seems it does tally up the science. ( hoping it doesn't double up when I get it to work ). And along with that my space bar doesn't seems to work. This is erratic however. it'll happen completely randomly. Staging just.. shuts down.

All of this can be negated with a restart.. most of the time.

Other mods I have that may factor in..

BoulderCo

CrewManisfest

Engineer

Mj

MissionController

Romfarer ( just the plugin and camera )

AlarmClock

UniversReplacer ( will switch to TR soon enough. Game works smooth as is don't want to fix something that's not broken )

WarpUnlocker

StrethcySRB

So does anyone else experience these small, yet annoying glitches?
